Reason for change: Seat remained vacant because legislature had failed to elect . Winner was elected June 8 , 1827
Resigned May 20 , 1828 , to become U.S. Minister Plenipotentiary to Gran Columbia . A special election was held December 10 , 1828
Resigned August 26 , 1828 , after being appointed to the Maine Supreme Judicial Court . A special election was held January 15 , 1829
Resigned before November 7 , 1828 . A special election was held November 7 , 1828
Resigned November 14 , 1828 . A special election was held December 15 , 1828
Resigned December 20 , 1828 , to become Governor of New York . A special election was held January 15 , 1829
Resigned January 12 , 1829 , due to failing health . A special election was held January 30 , 1829
Resigned January 30 , 1829 , after being elected to New Jersey 's Class 1 U.S. Senate seat
